page.title: 18 WESTON'S INDUSTRIES.
page.content: Weston houses a number of industrial firms.These firms are:-Chellingworth and Singer,who manufacture machinery, Laing,who hire and sell scaffolding and Stafford Van Hire,who as the name suggests,hire out trucks and vans. Stafford Van Hire is a self hire company which has a number of trucks made by Ford,Vauxhall and Toyota. Laing is a large company and has many branches in Britain.It is a popular industry and employs many workers. Weston's branch is run by the deputy manager,Mr.David Earle. Chellingworth and Singer is a small industry.The company makes machinery such as lathes and wood-working machines.
